author: hgc-tpg
body:
#### PR description:
- Add several cluster shape variables meant to be implementable in firmware

Associated internal PRs and reviews:
- hgc-tpg#2
- hgc-tpg#47

Related presentation in HGCAL TPG meetings:
- [Study of alternative cluster shape variables](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1060474/#sc-7-2-study-of-alternative-cl)
- [Cluster shape variables quantization](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1122266/#3-updates-on-cluster-shape-var)
- [Updated studies on quantized shape variables](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1216136/#4-updated-studies-on-quantized)

#### PR validation:
Tested D86, D92, D9 workflows
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 20034.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D86
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 22434.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D92
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 23234.0 --maxSteps=2 & # D94
```
title: [HGCAL trigger] Additional cluster shape variables
